CustomField.description: Indicates if this Lead is retrospectively migrated from Accounts and Contacts, per MyPost Business' requirements / solution design. This flag is used to prevent Marketing Cloud to send customers on Journeys they have already started on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if this Lead is migrated from an Account + Contact pair. Used for suppressing Marketing Cloud Journeys.
CustomField.label: Is Migrated?
